TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataBinding extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含有關 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項中的單一資料繫結運算式的資訊，可讓 Microsoft Visual Studio 之類的快速應用程式開發 (RAD) 設計工具在設計階段建立資料繫結運算式。

span.span: Contains information about a single data-binding expression in an ASP.NET server control, which allows rapid-application development (RAD) designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, to create data-binding expressions at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個伺服器控制項中的資料繫結運算式由在設計階段的執行個體類別。Each data-binding expression in a server control is represented at design time by an instance of the class. 包含一或多個資料繫結運算式的任何伺服器控制項已物件，其中包含物件。Any server control that contains one or more data-binding expressions has a object that contains the objects. 這個集合是可透過存取類別實作介面。This collection is accessible through the class implementing the interface. 當您建立自訂的 RAD 設計工具時，使用該實作來存取集合。When you create a custom RAD designer, use that implementation to access the collection. 任何或只能在設計階段的伺服器控制項相關聯的物件存在。Any or objects associated with a server control exist only at design time. 它們在執行階段並不存在，因此，不能存取在執行階段。They do not exist at run time and, therefore, are not accessible during run time. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件以及設定它等於控制項中的現有物件集合，其中具有`propertyName`參數的值為`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含物件`propertyName`的值`Text`，此程式碼會傳回物件的值屬性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果沒有這類物件，它會傳回空字串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件以及設定它等於控制項中的現有物件集合，其中具有`propertyName`參數的值為`Text`。The following code example creates a object and sets it equal to an existing object in the control's collection that has a `propertyName` parameter with a value of `Text`. 如果集合包含物件`propertyName`的值`Text`，此程式碼會傳回物件的值屬性。If the collection contains a object with a `propertyName` value of `Text`, this code returns the value of the object's property. 如果沒有這類物件，它會傳回空字串 ("")。If there is no such object, it returns an empty string (""). summary.span: 為 物件的執行個體擷取雜湊程式碼。

span.span: Retrieves the hash code for an instance of the object.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件放置在物件，只能在設計階段存取。 objects are placed in a object, accessible only at design time. 這個集合是表示在控制項上的繫結的雜湊資料表。The collection is a hash table that represents the bindings on a control. 只能有一個繫結每個屬性，因此雜湊程式碼計算符合實作，只需的屬性名稱到帳戶。There can only be one binding per property, so the hash code computation matches the implementation and only takes the property name into account.

The property to bind data to.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會宣告三個變數， `dataBindingOutput1`， `dataBindingOutput2`，並`dataBindingOutput3`，存取的屬性不同物件， `myDataBinding2`。The following code example declares three variables, `dataBindingOutput1`, `dataBindingOutput2`, and `dataBindingOutput3`, which access the different properties of a object, `myDataBinding2`. 它接著會將指派的值屬性設`dataBindingOutput1`，其串連的字串 「 屬性名稱 」，並將值寫入至檔案。It then assigns the value of the property to `dataBindingOutput1`, concatenates it with the string "The property name is ", and writes the value to a file. [!code-csharp[DataBinding_Sample1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/CS/databinding_samp1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[DataBinding_Sample1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataBinding_Sample1/VB/databinding_samp1.vb#6)]
